issue.title: [Python] Sequence converter for float32 not implemented
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2007](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2007). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See bug report in <https://github.com/apache/arrow/issues/1431,> example
```java

import pyarrow as pa
l = [[1.2, 3.4], [9.0, 42.0]]
pa.array(l, type=pa.list_(pa.float32()))
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2007?focusedCommentId=16341158) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1509
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1509>
